1662630.name: RPG Maker MZ - MT Tiny Tales Dungeon Tiles
1662630.description:
Tiny Tales is designed for those who want to create a cutesy yet epic adventure scenario for their game. In TT: Dungeons, we cover castles, fortresses, mines and hi-tech facilities!

Features:

- An assortment walls, floors and autotiles to create dungeons!
- Spritesheets for doors, chests, torches and braziers!
- Different styles available: Fortresses, Snow Fortresses, Mines, Hi-tech dungeon and City Walls!
- Some extra tiles to decorate your dungeon, like brand new lab equipment!

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
1662630.supported_languages: 英语, 日语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 俄语, 简体中文, 繁体中文, 韩语
